title: Calories in One Ataulfo Mango
meta_description: Discover calories in a ataulfo mango, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
assumptions: Medium-sized Ataulfo mango (~100g edible portion), ripe, peeled and pitted; values based on USDA data for this variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specific produce.

quick_answer.text: One medium Ataulfo mango has about 60 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Blended into a smoothie with yogurt (add 100g plain yogurt)
Dried mango slices (dehydrated, no added sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories in a ataulfo mango?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal for one medium Ataulfo mango.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in an Ataulfo mango?
faqs.a: Around 13.7 g of natural sugars per medium fruit.

faqs.q: Are Ataulfo mangos low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.4 g total fat per mango, with minimal saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much fiber in one Ataulfo mango?
faqs.a: Approximately 1.6 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Is an Ataulfo mango healthier than regular mango?
faqs.a: Similar nutrition, but Ataulfo is sweeter and often smaller, with comparable calories per gram.
